verses.name: Deuteronomy 33:20
verses.text: And of Gad he said, Blessed be he that enlargeth Gad: he dwelleth as a lion, and teareth the arm with the crown of the head.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 33:21
verses.text: And he provided the first part for himself, because there, in a portion of the lawgiver, was he seated; and he came with the heads of the people, he executed the justice of the Lord, and his judgments with Israel.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 33:22
verses.text: And of Dan he said, Dan is a lion’s whelp: he shall leap from Bashan.
